mapper.select: elect no from user where email = #{email}
select name, email, password, gender from user where no = #{no}
select no, name, gender, role from user where email = #{email} and password = #{password}

choose.when: update user set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender} where no = #{no}
choose.otherwise: update user set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, gender = #{gender} where no = #{no}
